description.value:
Requirements You are in a swamp environment near an environmental feature that would allow you to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Take Cover].

In swamplands, you are particularly skilled at quickly hiding behind bits of underbrush or foliage, or moving quietly through murky water. You Take Cover and then use that cover to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Hide].
